verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* thereof:

Thou shalt \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*,

Paving diligently \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* province \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* equally \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w three|strong="H8027"\w* \w parts|strong="H8027"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* forced \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w manslaughter|strong="H7523"\w*, \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H8033"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* hand whither \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w escape|strong="H5127"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* law \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w slayer|strong="H5221"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* fleeth, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* life \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* saved: \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* killeth \w his|strong="H0834"\w* neighbour ignorantly, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* proved \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8130"\w* \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day \w before|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hew \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* cutting \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w axe|strong="H1631"\w* slipped \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* slipping \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w handle|strong="H6086"\w* struck \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* aforesaid, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* live:

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w next|strong="H1350"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* whose \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w*, pushed \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* grief \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* apprehend \w him|strong="H5221"\w*. \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w too|strong="H3808"\w* \w long|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w take|strong="H5221"\w* \w away|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w guilty|strong="H0310"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* proved \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w had|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8130"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* thou \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* equal distance \w one|strong="H3651"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* another.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*,

(\w Yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w*) thou shalt \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w other|strong="H5750"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt double \w the|strong="H3605"\w* number \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* aforesaid:

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H1961"\w* possess, lest thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w hating|strong="H8130"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour, \w lie|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* aforesaid,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* refuge, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w whose|strong="H8033"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt take away \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guilt|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* remove thy neighbourâ€™s landmark, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thy predecessors \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*. \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w receive|strong="H3423"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* wickedness \w be|strong="H3808"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* lying \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, accusing \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* transgression,

\w Both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, between \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0251"\w* \w when|strong="H2009"\w* \w after|strong="H1875"\w* most diligent inquisition, they \w shall|strong="H0251"\w* find \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* hath told \w a|strong="H0251"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* against \w his|strong="H8199"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*:

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* render \w to|strong="H0251"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* meant \w to|strong="H0251"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0251"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* thou shalt take \w away|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0251"\w* thee:

\w That|strong="H8085"\w* others \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* dare \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* \w him|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt require \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.
